LanguageData.RWBY_Myrtenaster_Melee.label: 柳葉白菀
LanguageData.RWBY_Myrtenaster_Melee.description: Myrtenaster is Weiss Schnee's signature weapon. It is a Multi Action Dust Rapier (MADR) that seems to act as a focus or source for Weiss' power.
